description:
My place is close to Peaches, Chez Oskar and the A/C subway stop. You’ll love my place because of the light, the kitchen, and the comfy bed. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Beautiful loft apt., full of light, on a quiet block of Bed-Stuy.
Minutes to the subway train and new restaurants around the corner.

There is one real bed for two and a futon that can sleep another two people.

You will have the whole loft for yourself.

A few blocks from the A/C train at Utica - 30mn to central Manhattan.
name: Beautiful loft apt. on quiet Bed-Stuy block
review: Valentina's place was perfect. It was quiet, clean, and Valentina was in touch whenever I needed her for anything. The place is in a beautiful neighbourhood, residential enough that I could sleep easily, but still with fantastic cafes and restaurants just around the corner. And The A and C trains stop just two blocks away, so you can get to anywhere on Manhattan really easily (and it's only 20 mins to lower Manhattan). It's relatively large for a NY studio apartment, and would definitely comfortably fit at least two people for a while. This is the first of many AirBnB's I've had in NY that I wish I could stay longer in, and I would be happy living here. Thank you Valentina for being a fantastic host, and your beautiful place!
